tag_list: animation, film-special-effects-solution, innovative-solutions-of-procedures-on-branding, media-planning, program, brand-positioning--campaigns, digital-art-media
overview:
Animation, Vfx, CG and motion graphics from Murali Kamath is produced on schedule and within budget for a diverse range of digital video production to interactive design Hollywood studios. Boutique visual-effects for various movies and teleseries. These commercials, films, branded content covered a wide range of animated disciplines that express a imaginative flair and a cinematic look. If you would like to know more about any of Kamath services, or if you would like to meet him to discuss any of your upcoming projects, please get in touch.

Murali Kamath is a creative and high-end animation and VFX production provider based in Bangalore, India. Mainly known for animation, modelling, design, simulations and compositing, but regularly produce animations for film, television and commercials.. With over 12 years of knowledge in the animation Industry, Kamath has a team made up of motion graphics designers, including feature-caliber artists.
